text: we may also be able to get around the "can't fullscreen an iOS simulator" problem by actually running an iPad app and connect using one of these <http://store.apple.com/us/product/MD826ZM/A/lightning-digital-av-adapter>

attachments.text: The Lightning Digital AV Adapter mirrors what you see on your iPad, iPhone, or iPod so you can enjoy it on your widescreen TV or another HDMI-compatible display.
attachments.fallback: The Lightning Digital AV Adapter mirrors what you see on your iPad, iPhone, or iPod so you can enjoy it on your widescreen TV or another HDMI-compatible display.

text: <@U026PHQ3J> can we get one of those for testing?
wait never mind, the touch events wouldn't make it back to the iPad. Quick, can we develop an adapter for Planar?
